body_html:
ok I just fixed mine by removing every CMakeCache, and use these settings:

`
set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\VC\Auxiliary"

set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64

set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1

set PYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:\Users\mingy\Anaconda3\python.exe

set TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST=7.5

call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11

python setup.py install

`

It's still building.... hopefully no error, will report back if it broke
body_text:
ok I just fixed mine by removing every CMakeCache, and use these settings:
`
set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\VC\Auxiliary"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
set PYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:\Users\mingy\Anaconda3\python.exe
set TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST=7.5
call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11
python setup.py install
`
It's still building.... hopefully no error, will report back if it broke
body:
ok I just fixed mine by removing every CMakeCache, and use these settings:

`
set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\VC\Auxiliary"

set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64

set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1

set PYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:\Users\mingy\Anaconda3\python.exe

set TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST=7.5

call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11

python setup.py install

`

It's still building.... hopefully no error, will report back if it broke
